choose.when:
insert into t_user ( username, password, income, if_adult, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date ) values
( #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.income,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.ifAdult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
